BackstoryDef.title: vatgrown soldier
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] wasn't made as a person, but as an instrument of destruction. Grown in a bioweapons facility and taught combat during [PAWN_possessive] accelerated growth, [PAWN_nameDef] still has a proclivity for combat of all kinds and an aversion to human contact.

BackstoryDef.title: mute
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] wasn't made as a person, but as an instrument of destruction. Grown in a bioweapons facility and taught combat during [PAWN_possessive] accelerated growth, Something went horribly wrong however and [PAWN_nameDef] was greatly affected by a traumatic event early in [PAWN_possessive] life. For many years [PAWN_pronoun] refused to speak to people, preferring instead to play with the stray animals that roamed near the corporate outpost.

BackstoryDef.title: former organ farm
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] wasn't made as a person. Grown in a corporate organ harvesting facility. [PAWN_possessive] body was used to grow organic implants for sick or aging c-suite executives. A group of radical free Beta-Humanoids raided this operation and freed all the organ farms they could. Though [PAWN_possessive] upbringing has left [PAWN_objective] haunted, it has also given [PAWN_objective] a unique understanding of human biology.

BackstoryDef.title: medical assistant
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] wasn't made as a person, but as an instrument of healing. Grown in a medical facility [PAWN_pronoun] was given medical training during their accelerated aging. Shortly after being activated a massive fire broke out and [PAWN_nameDef] assisted in the treatment of the burn victims. [PAWN_pronoun] was left with a lifelong fear of fire.
